column5: Dive into the world of global enterprise with Southampton's MSc in International Entrepreneurship and Management. Tailored for those with a passion for international business ventures and management, you'll explore using global case studies and hands-on examples. A standout feature? Our unique module on ‘Social Enterprise and Entrepreneurship’ — a rarity among UK business schools.With us, you'll gain more than just academic insight. Thanks to our faculty's robust connections with giants like Amazon, Sainsbury’s, and Rolls-Royce, you'll immerse yourself in a vibrant entrepreneurial ecosystem.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
